CustomField.formula:
CASE(1, IF(((SchedStartTime >= DATETIMEVALUE('2020-12-17 00:00:00') && SchedStartTime <= DATETIMEVALUE('2021-03-22 23:59:59'))|| ISBLANK(SchedStartTime)),1,0),'1ยบ TRIMESTRE',
IF((SchedStartTime >= DATETIMEVALUE('2021-03-23 00:00:00') && SchedStartTime <= DATETIMEVALUE('2021-06-21 23:59:59')),1,0),'2ยบ TRIMESTRE',
IF((SchedStartTime >= DATETIMEVALUE('2021-06-22 00:00:00') && SchedStartTime <= DATETIMEVALUE('2021-09-21 23:59:59')),1,0),'3ยบ TRIMESTRE',
IF((SchedStartTime >= DATETIMEVALUE('2021-09-22 00:00:00') && SchedStartTime <= DATETIMEVALUE('2021-12-17 23:59:59')),1,0),'4ยบ TRIMESTRE',
'')
CustomField.label: TRIMESTRE VISITA
